name: The FOOL!
description:
CONTROLS: 

 -------------------------- 

use WASD to move
SPACE to jump
R to restart level

----------------------------

The Fool is an action game where you can't attack. Because of this you will have to lure your enemies into killing each other! 

We planned on adding spells and environmental hazards that would allow you to manipulate the enemies further, but we didn't have the time...
